createData.title: Improve API rate limiting and error messages
createData.description:
Mike committed to building out API rate limiting improvements this week.

- Current error messages are confusing for customers
- Will add exponential backoff suggestions in error responses
- Will add dashboard widget showing API usage
- Design doc to be shared

Source: Morning standup 2025-01-20

operations.reasoning: Clear commitment from Mike to improve rate limiting this week. No existing issues, so CREATE is appropriate.
